[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetXPosition":17,"WidgetYPosition":20,"WidgetRows":4,"WidgetColumns":7,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as MoreDays3ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as MoreDays3Done
from Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 4, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Media","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetXPosition":24,"WidgetYPosition":20,"WidgetRows":4,"WidgetColumns":16,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-5, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where d.AgreedDate < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-5, 5) and d.AgreedDate > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-5, 0)
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-4, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where d.AgreedDate < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-4, 5) and d.AgreedDate > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-4, 0)
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-3, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where d.AgreedDate < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-3, 5) and d.AgreedDate > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-3, 0)
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-2, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where d.AgreedDate < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-2, 5) and d.AgreedDate > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-2, 0)
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-1, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where d.AgreedDate < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-1, 5) and d.AgreedDate > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-1, 0)
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where d.AgreedDate < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7, 5) and d.AgreedDate > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7, 0)
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+1, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where d.AgreedDate < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+1, 5) and d.AgreedDate > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+1, 0)
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+2, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where d.AgreedDate < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+2, 5) and d.AgreedDate > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+2, 0)
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+3, 0) as Week,
IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where d.AgreedDate < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+3, 5) and d.AgreedDate > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+3, 0)
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+4, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where d.AgreedDate < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+4, 5) and d.AgreedDate > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+4, 0)
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+5, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where d.AgreedDate < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+5, 5) and d.AgreedDate > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+5, 0)
		and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Filters

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetXPosition":24,"WidgetYPosition":11,"WidgetRows":9,"WidgetColumns":24,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select v.[Name] as UserName, v.CreatedBy as UserId, v.Day, v.[HasImage], sum(v.Done) as Done, sum(v.ToDo) as ToDo
from (
select d.CreatedBy, u.[Name], u.[HasImage],
		case 
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate ) < Convert(Date, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) then 0
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) then 1
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 1, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 2
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 3
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 3, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 4
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 4, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 5
		end as Day,
		sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)) as ToDo,
		sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)) as Done
from Deliverable d
full join [Event] e
on d.[Oid] = e.[Oid]
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
full join [User] u
on u.[Oid] = d.[CreatedBy]
where e.[GCRecord] is null and d.CreatedBy is not null and 
		(u.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(u.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(u.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
group by d.CreatedBy, d.AgreedDate, u.[Name], u.[HasImage]
) as v
group by v.CreatedBy, v.Day, v.[Name], v.[HasImage]","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetXPosition":24,"WidgetYPosition":2,"WidgetRows":9,"WidgetColumns":24,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select v.[Name] as Client, v.Client as ClientId, v.Day, v.[HasImage], sum(v.Done) as Done, sum(v.ToDo) as ToDo
from (
select d.Client, cc.[Name], cc.[HasImage],
		case 
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate ) < Convert(Date, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) then 0
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) then 1
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 1, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 2
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 3
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 3, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 4
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 4, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 5
		end as Day,
		sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)) as ToDo,
		sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)) as Done
from Deliverable d
full join [Event] e
on d.[Oid] = e.[Oid]
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
full join [CommercialClient] cc
on cc.[Oid] = d.[Client]
where e.[GCRecord] is null and d.Client is not null and 
		(d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
group by d.Client, d.AgreedDate, cc.[Name], cc.[HasImage]
) as v
group by v.Client, v.Day, v.[Name], v.[HasImage]","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetXPosition":17,"WidgetYPosition":16,"WidgetRows":4,"WidgetColumns":7,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as TomorrowToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as TomorrowDone
from Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 1, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetXPosition":1,"WidgetYPosition":20,"WidgetRows":4,"WidgetColumns":7,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as MoreDays1ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as MoreDays1Done
from Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":2,"WidgetRows":14,"WidgetColumns":24,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select 	d.CreatedBy as UserId, 
		u.[Name] as [User], 
		u.[HasImage] as UserHasImage,
		e.Subject as Name,
		p.[Name] as Project, 
		convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) as Date,
		cc.Name as Client,
		cc.HasImage as ClientHasImage,
		cc.Oid as ClientId
from [CommercialClient] cc, Deliverable d
full join [Event] e
on d.[Oid] = e.[Oid]
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
full join Project p
on p.[Oid] = d.Project
left join [User] u
on u.[Oid] = d.CreatedBy
where 	cc.Oid = d.Client and
		(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5)and
		d.AgreedDate < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7, 5) and 
		d.AgreedDate > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7, 0) and
		(u.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(u.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(u.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
order by d.AgreedDate","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetXPosition":1,"WidgetYPosition":16,"WidgetRows":4,"WidgetColumns":7,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select count(d.Client) as countLate

where Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) < Convert(Date, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) and (wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5)

		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]
